thread.title: ONE PUFF UNDER SHELTER, AND NEA OFFICER FINED ME!
thread.title_full: ONE PUFF UNDER SHELTER, AND NEA OFFICER FINED ME!

author: farhan
title: ONE PUFF UNDER SHELTER, AND NEA OFFICER FINED ME!
text:
ONE PUFF UNDER SHELTER, AND NEA OFFICER FINED ME!   
Dear A.S.S. Editor Advertisement 
Just got caught by NEA-outsourced auxiliary officer. For "smoking" in "non smoking" area although I wasn't puffing on the cigarette and there was a bin full of cigarette butts in the non smoking area under shelter. So I didn't even know it was a non smoking area. 
I was smoking outside, then walked in under the shelter and was going to put my cigarette out on the bin, unfortunately I took one last puff before that and... in they swooped. Technically speaking, I had "smoked" in a non smoking area. 
Location is at people's park, next to OG. These farkers stand there waiting for you to make ONE mistake. Damage: $200. Be warned. 
fatbastardx 
A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
